content: अभिसारिका A woman who either goes to meet her lover or keeps an appointment made by him; <ls>Ku. 6. 43</ls>; <ls>R. 16. 12</ls>; अभिसारयते कांतं या मन्मथवशंवदा . स्वयं वाभिसरत्येषा धीरैरुक्ताऽभिसारिका <ls>S. D. 115</ls>; कांतार्थिनी तु या याति संकेतं साभिसारिका <ls>Ak.</ls> The directions as to dress &c. to be observed by the different kinds of अभिसारिका are given in <ls>S. D. 116.</ls> The <ls>S. D.</ls> further recommends the following {8} places as eligible spots for lovers to meet:-- (1) a field; (2) a garden; (3) a ruined temple; (4) the house of a female messenger; (5) forest; (6) caravansary (a place for pilgrims &c.); (7) a cemetery, and (8) the bank of a river; क्षेत्रं वाटी भग्नदेवालयो दूतीगृहं वनं . मालयं च श्मशानं च नद्यादीनां तटी तथा ..
